name: Crystal Quest (itch) (Maks "Skill" Tym)
description:
This is a submission for the Global Game Jam 2023! Please vote on the game here, if you can <3

Play as Sonia, the villager mage in this sidescroller metroid-like platformer. Shoot through hordes of beasts and try to get the magic crystals that harness the power of The Old Wise Tree, so your people can survive. Can you pass the test, that The Tree prepared for you?

Controls:

W - jump

AD - left, right

Mouse - aim

LMB - shoot

Credits: 

 Maksymilian "Skill" Tym - Lead, code, graphics, game design, sound

Diana Czeladzka - graphics, writing, game design
